name: Hack n Smash
description:
Gameplay:

You are a Robot Viking! 

Smashing your way through a dungeon filled with monstrous monsters and dangerous traps.

Your task: reach the exit of the dungeon on level 10.

Puzzle will slow you down and you will have to solve them in the middle of fight.

Controls:

Play single player or with a friend on the same computer

  • move: zqsd / wqsd / gamepad LS
  • attack / throw: lmb / gamepad RT
  • super attack: space / gamepad RB
  • run: L shift / gamepad LT
  • pickup orb: rmb / gamepad LB
Team:
  • Music: Anchorlight
  • Game-Art: Bu
  • Covert-Art: StudioAlphaZeta
  • Code: Togis
  • SFX: https://freesound.org
Links
  • Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/tobugis
  • Code: https://github.com/sboigelot/tobujam1
Speedrun! Can you beat the developer time of completing all levels in 7 minutes and 11 seconds? Post your score in the comments!
